tool.name: Create script from the template file
tool.description: used to create script file from user given input to build a model

param.name: RDATA
param.label: SELECT FILE CONATINING INPUT DATA
param.help: RData format

param.name: GETDATAINFOEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: GETDATAINFOECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print. default is False

param.name: GETDATAINFORESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: MISSINGFILTEREVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: MISSINGFILTERECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: MISSINGFILTERRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: MISSINGFILTERTHRESHC
param.help: For column wise default is 0.2

param.name: MISSINGFILTERTHRESHR
param.help: For row wise default is 0.2

param.name: PCAEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: PCAECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print. default is False

param.name: PCARESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: PCACOMP
param.help: set according to need. Default is 3

param.name: PCAPLOTEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to plot PCA. default is TRUE

param.name: PCAPLOTECHO
param.help: Set True if wish to Print .default is False

param.name: PCAPLOTRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: PCAPLOTFIG
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITEVAL
param.help: set TRUE for splitting in test and train set.default is True

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SAAMPLING
param.help: default is with No sampling

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: PERCENT
param.help: default is 0.8

param.name: NZVEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: NZVRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: NZVECHO
param.label: Write Code in Document
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: CORRFILTEREVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: CORRFILTERRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: CORRFILTERECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: THRESHHOLDCOR
param.help: set according to need .default is 0.75

param.name: PREPROCEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: PREPROCECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: PREPROCRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: SETUPWORKERSEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is False

param.name: SETUPWORKERSECHO
param.label: Write Code in Document
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SETUPWORKERSRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: NUMWORKERS
param.help: default is 1

param.name: SETUPRESAMPLINGECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SETUPRESAMPLINGRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: RESAMPNAME
param.label: Set type of resampling for cross validation
param.help: default is boot632

param.name: RESAMPLENUMBER
param.label: Set Number of Times to Resample
param.help: default is 10

param.name: NUMREPEAT
param.label: Set Number of Times to run
param.help: default is 3

param.name: RESAMPLENUMBERPERCENT
param.help: default is 0.75

param.name: SETUPGRIDRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: SETUPGRIDECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SETUPGRIDSIZE
param.help: default is 3

param.name: FITMODELEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: FITMODELRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: FITMODELECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: MODELDESCRECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: MODELDESCRRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: RESAMPTABLEECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: RESAMPTABLERESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: PROFILEPLOTECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: PROFILEPLOTFIG
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: STOPWORKERSECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: STOPWORKERSRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: TESTPREDRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: TESTPREDECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print. default is False

param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: CLASSPROBSTEXECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: CLASSPROBSTEXRESULT1
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: CLASSPROBSTEXECHO1
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SAVEDATAECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SAVEDATARESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: GETDATAINFOEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: GETDATAINFOECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print. default is False

param.name: GETDATAINFORESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: PARAMAETERS1
param.label: 1. REMOVE MISSING VALUES FROM THE INPUT DATA

param.name: MISSINGFILTEREVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: MISSINGFILTERECHO
param.label: 1(i). Write Code in Document
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: MISSINGFILTERRESULT
param.label: 1(ii). Write Result in document
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex
param.option: hide-result will not written in file

param.name: MISSINGFILTERTHRESHC
param.label: 1(iii). Set Cutoff Value for Missing Data value Columwise
param.help: For column wise default is 0.1 means column which has missing value more than 10% will be removed

param.name: MISSINGFILTERTHRESHR
param.label: 1(iv). Set Cutoff Value for Missing Data Value Rowwise
param.help: For row wise default is 0.1 means row having more than 10% missing values will be removed

param.name: MISSINGFILTEREVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is FALSE

param.name: MISSINGFILTERECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: MISSINGFILTERRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: PCAEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: PCAECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print. default is False

param.name: PCARESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: PCACOMP
param.label: 2. FIND NUMBER OF PRINCIPLE COMPONENT
param.help: performs PCA and gives number of PC. Default is 3

param.name: PCAPLOTEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to plot PCA. default is TRUE

param.name: PCAPLOTECHO
param.help: Set True if wish to Print .default is False

param.name: PCAPLOTRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: PCAPLOTFIG
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: PARAMAETERS2
param.label: 3. CUSTOMIZE PARAMETERS FOR DATA SPLITTING
param.help: splits data in test and train set.

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITEVAL
param.help: set TRUE for splitting in test and train set.default is True

param.name: SAAMPLING
param.label: 3(i). Select Sampling Method
param.help: Defualt is with No sampling. you may choose downsample or upsample

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITECHO
param.label: 3(ii). Write Code in Document
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITRESULT
param.label: 3(iii). Write Result in document
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex
param.option: hide-result will not written in file

param.name: PERCENT
param.label: 3(iv) .Set Value at Which Data Will be Splitted in Train and Test Set
param.help: default is 0.8

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITEVAL
param.help: set TRUE for splitting in test and train set.default is True

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SAAMPLING
param.help: default is with No sampling

param.name: INITIALDATASPLITRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: PERCENT
param.help: default is 0.8

param.name: PARAMAETERS3
param.label: 4. REMOVE NEAR ZERO VARIANCE
param.help: removes NZV from train and test set.

param.name: NZVEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: NZVECHO
param.label: 4(i). Write Code in Document
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: NZVRESULT
param.label: 4(ii). Write Result in document
param.help: Set tex if wish to write result in output pdf file. default is tex
param.option: hide-result will not written in file

param.name: NZVEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate.

param.name: NZVECHO
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate.

param.name: NZVRESULT
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate.

param.name: PARAMAETERS4
param.label: 5. REMOVE CORRELATED VALUES
param.help: removes correlated attributes from train and test set.

param.name: CORRFILTEREVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: THRESHHOLDCOR
param.label: 5(i). cutoff for correlated Value
param.help: set according to need .default is 0.75 means attributes have 75% or more correlation are ommited from the data

param.name: CORRFILTERECHO
param.label: 5(ii). Write Code in Document
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: CORRFILTERRESULT
param.label: 5(iii). Write Result in document
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex
param.option: hide-result will not written in file

param.name: PARAMAETERS5
param.label: 6. PERFORM CENTERING AND SCALING OF DATA
param.help: centering and scaling of train and test set.

param.name: PREPROCEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: PREPROCECHO
param.label: 6(i). Write Code in Document
param.help: set True if wish to write code in document .default is False

param.name: PREPROCRESULT
param.label: 6(ii). Write Result in document
param.help: Set tex if wish to write result in output pdf file. default is tex
param.option: hide-result will not written in file

param.name: SETUPWORKERSEVAL
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is False

param.name: SETUPWORKERSECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: NUMWORKERS
param.label: 7. SET NUMBER OF PROCESSORS
param.help: default is 1

param.name: PARAMAETERS6
param.label: 8. CUSTOMIZE RESAMPLING PARAMETERS
param.help: resampling for cross validation

param.name: SETUPRESAMPLINGECHO
param.label: 8(i). write code for resampling
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SETUPRESAMPLINGRESULT
param.label: 8(ii). Write Result in document
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide
param.option: hide-result will not written in file

param.name: RESAMPNAME
param.label: 8(iii). select Resample method for cross validation
param.help: default is boot632

param.name: RESAMPLENUMBER
param.label: 8(iv). Set Number of times Resample
param.help: default is 10

param.name: NUMREPEAT
param.label: 8(v). Set Number of times to repeat
param.help: default is 3

param.name: RESAMPLENUMBERPERCENT
param.label: 8(vi). Set Percent splitting of data for resampling
param.help: default is 0.75

param.name: SETUPRESAMPLINGECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SETUPRESAMPLINGRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: RESAMPNAME
param.label: Set type of resampling for cross validation
param.help: default is boot632

param.name: RESAMPLENUMBER
param.label: Set Number of Times to Resample
param.help: default is 10

param.name: NUMREPEAT
param.label: Set Number of Times to run
param.help: default is 3

param.name: RESAMPLENUMBERPERCENT
param.help: default is 0.75

param.name: SETUPGRIDRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: SETUPGRIDECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SETUPGRIDSIZE
param.label: 9. SET SIZE OF GRID
param.help: default is 3

param.name: FITMODELEVAL
param.label: 10. BUILD A MODEL AND WRITE RESULT IN DOCUMENT
param.help: default is TRUE

param.name: FITMODELECHO
param.label: 10(i). Write Code for model building in Document
param.help: set True if wish to write code in document .default is False

param.name: MODELDESCRECHO
param.label: 10(ii). Write code for Model Description
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: MODELDESCRRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: RESAMPTABLEECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: RESAMPTABLERESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: PROFILEPLOTECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: PROFILEPLOTFIG
param.help: set TRUE if wish to evaluate. default is TRUE

param.name: STOPWORKERSECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: STOPWORKERSRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: TESTPREDRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: TESTPREDECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print. default is False

param.name: CLASSPROBSTEXRESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

param.name: CLASSPROBSTEXECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: CLASSPROBSTEXRESULT1
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is hide

param.name: CLASSPROBSTEXECHO1
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SAVEDATAECHO
param.help: set True if wish to print .default is False

param.name: SAVEDATARESULT
param.help: Set tex if wish to write in output pdf file. default is tex

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Instruction**
----------
Users may change any parameter as their requirement. For normal practice
user required to provide only input csv file and method for model building.
More details are given in user manual.Please click here
